taskDescription: Draw the five resonance structures of the cyclopentadienyl anion. Are all carbon–carbon bonds equivalent? How many absorption lines would you expect to see in the 1H NMR and 13C NMR spectra of the anion?
detailedSolution: All C – C bonds are equivalent; one resonance line in both 1H and 13C NMR spectra.
